title: 84/193/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 March 1984 approving the amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 March 1984
approving the amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/193/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy, is hereby approved.
The amendment of the plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 January 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
